FuncDef: This commands assigns a bi-directional forwarding (BFD) session providing heart-beat mechanism for the given VRRP/SRRP instance. There can be only one BFD session assigned to any given VRRP/SRRP instance, but there can be multiple SRRP/VRRP sessions using the same BFD session. If the interface configured with BFD is using a LAG or a spoke-SDP, the BFD transmit and receive intervals need to be set to a minimum of 300 ms.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the service ID of the interface running BFD. If no svc-id is specified then it indicates that the interface is a network interface in the Base router instance. Values-{id | svc-name}.
Specifies the name of the interface running BFD, up to 32 characters.
Specifies the destination address for the BFD session.
Specifies a service name, up to 64 characters.
